pageContext.claim: “China already charges a tax of 16% on soybeans. Canada has all sorts of trade barriers on our Agricultural products. Not acceptable!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump complains about tariffs imposed by other countries but the United States supports American farmers with subsidies that other countries complain gives them an unfair competitive advantage. China, for instance, complains that subsidies from the U.S. government have given American soybean farmers an unfair competitive advantage in selling to China.
